text: For Two Pins is a 1914 silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * James Hodges - John Dunn * Marguerite Ne Moyer - Martha Dunn * James Hevener - The Drunk * Raymond McKee - The Chief of Police * Oliver Hardy - A Policeman (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:Comedy short films
title: For Two Pins
